title: Hacksaw Ridge

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Nominee Oscar
awardEventDetails.for: Best Motion Picture of the Year

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Nominee Oscar
awardEventDetails.for: Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Winner Oscar
awardEventDetails.description: Kevin O'Connell - Andy Wright - Robert Mackenzie - Peter Grace

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Nominee BAFTA Film Award
awardEventDetails.description: Peter Grace - Robert Mackenzie - Kevin O'Connell - Andy Wright

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Winner Satellite Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Actor in a Motion Picture

awardEventDetails.title: 2017 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (HACKSAW RIDGE explodes the conceit of heroism in this epic American war movie with hope at its beating heart. Mel Gibson commands an army of artists in this true tale of World War II combat medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector whose weapon of choice was faith. Andrew Garfield's wondrous resolve is a bright light amidst the unforgiving imagery of the battle scenes - a dance macabre choreographed to plant the seeds of humanity with each living soldier who descends from the heavens - and the hell of Hacksaw Ridge.)

56 wins & 115 nominations

Andrew Knight - Robert Schenkkan
2017 Nominee Satellite Award

Rupert Gregson-Williams

AFI Awards, USA

2017 Winner AFI Award
Movie of the Year
(HACKSAW RIDGE explodes the conceit of heroism in this epic American war movie with hope at its beating heart. Mel Gibson commands an army of artists in this true tale of World War II combat medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector whose weapon of choice was faith. Andrew Garfield's wondrous resolve is a bright light amidst the unforgiving imagery of the battle scenes - a dance macabre choreographed to plant the seeds of humanity with each living soldier who descends from the heavens - and the hell of Hacksaw Ridge.)
